author: lektran
msg: Applied patch from Anil K Patel (OFBIZ-687) with minor mods, Category -> Products tab show small image for each product

author: danielf
msg: Refactored the scope and stack implementation and added handling of destruction callbacks. Added a utility class for putting servlet request, response and context objects into the current frame. And added bean factories for accessing the current servlet objects as beans. There is also a configuration file that make the servlet objects available as call scoped beans. Nothing is tested yet.

author: seelmann
msg: DIRSERVER-793: Replaced unicode characters by string literals

author: sebb
msg: Bug 41416 - don't use chunked encoding for XML provided in the text box
